name: 2001 Gujarat Earthquake
description: A devastating earthquake struck Gujarat, causing widespread destruction and loss of life.

name: 1993 Latur Earthquake
description: A strong earthquake hit Latur, Maharashtra, resulting in thousands of deaths and widespread damage.

name: 2015 Nepal Earthquake (Impact in India)
location: Bihar, Uttar Pradesh, West Bengal, India
description: The 2015 Nepal earthquake caused significant tremors and casualties in northern India.

name: 1905 Kangra Earthquake
description: A major earthquake struck Kangra, Himachal Pradesh, causing massive destruction and loss of life.

name: 1934 Bihar Earthquake
description: A powerful earthquake devastated Bihar, resulting in extensive damage and casualties.

name: 2013 North India Floods
description: Heavy rainfall led to devastating floods and landslides in Uttarakhand and Himachal Pradesh.

name: 2008 Bihar Flood
description: The Kosi River breached its embankment, causing massive flooding and displacement in Bihar.

name: 2014 Kashmir Floods
description: Widespread flooding in Jammu and Kashmir led to significant loss of life and property.

name: 2005 Maharashtra Floods
description: Record rainfall caused severe flooding in Mumbai and other parts of Maharashtra.

name: 1987 Bihar Flood
description: One of the worst floods in Bihar's history, affecting millions and causing widespread devastation.
